text: Trump: Russia is a paper tiger. Its economy is collapsing. Ukraine is handling well and may regain all territories and even more.
Phone call between Trump and Putin is not scheduled yet but can be organized quickly.
Rubio repeated Trump's demands to end the conflict in a meeting with Lavrov.
Wall Street Journal: Kyiv is preparing a major offensive.
Xi Jinping called hundreds of generals from around the world for an emergency meeting. Reasons not disclosed.
At the UN, Trump promised to 'take out Venezuela' and bragged about destroying Iranian military forces.
Trump advises NATO to shoot down Russian planes if they violate borders.
Rutte: Lavrov has been a foreign minister since the birth of Jesus Christ, and nothing useful has ever come out of his mouth.
Macron calls on NATO to work proactively.
Turkey sent a plane to Lithuania to detect drones.
Trump promises to start delivering F-35s to Turkey if US conditions are met.
India is ready to stop buying Russian oil if compensated with cheaper Venezuelan or Iranian oil.
Indian army tested a railway ballistic system.
Poland plans to host US nuclear weapons.
US State Department approved the sale of up to 400 Amraam missiles to Germany for $1.23B.
Rutte: US arms deliveries to Ukraine will continue uninterrupted.
Kyiv requests another $15B in aid.
Merkel proposes a €140B loan from frozen Russian assets.
Ukraine will start drone production for the US by mid-next year.
Renault prepares to produce drones for Ukrainian armed forces.
President of Taiwan met with a US delegation.
China imposed sanctions on six US companies.
Seoul: Pyongyang has 2 tons of enriched uranium.
Washington Post: Russia helps China prepare for a Taiwan landing operation.
Trump will not ban TikTok. Ellison bought the American part for $14B.
Ellison takes control of CBS and plans to buy CNN.
Comedian Kimmel returns to ABC criticizing Trump.
Netanyahu addressed American far-right.
Republicans plan to mint 500,000 coins featuring Kirk.
Trump presented a peace plan for Gaza.
Israel annexed a new settlement.
Sanctions lifted from Iran. President speaks at UN for the first time in 60 years.
US may recognize the Taliban to secure Bagram airbase.
Iran received MiG-29s and S-400 systems.
Rosatom will build a nuclear power plant in Iran for $25M.
Ankara and Washington signed a peaceful nuclear agreement.
Shooting at an immigration center in Dallas.
Trump will sign an order to eliminate 'leftist terrorism'.
Death penalty reinstated for murder in Washington DC.
Troops ready to deploy in Chicago, Memphis, and Portland.
White House prepares plan for mass layoffs.
Jeff Bezos installed a $165M fence around his villa.
Former FBI chief Comey faces 5 years for false statements.
Volkswagen halts production at two plants.
Bosch will cut 13,000 jobs.
Starbucks will close 400 stores in North America.
